summary: This is just the Ebony Blade Without its Enchantment and its craftable at the forge
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Ebony Katana~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~By Alfatossa~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



INTALLATION:

-Put the \"Simple_Ebony_Blade.esp\" file in your \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\" folder
-Activate it in the data file tab on the Skyrim launcher
-Enjoy!





DESCRITION:

This is just the Ebony blade without its Enchantmant and you can craft it at the forge in the \"MISC\" tab,
you need to have the \"Ebony Smithing\" perk to make it.


















~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Hope you enjoy this mod!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
author: alfatossa
